title: 【SkinMe】关于注册邮箱的问题
author: DJXGAME
txt_content:
本帖最后由 DJXGAME 于 2013-4-30 22:42 编辑 

Minecraft SkinMe 皮肤站正式开放啦~

但是，zhuogu爷爷今天起床的时候发现QQ邮箱退了600多封申请的邮件。所以他拜托我提醒大家：不要用QQ邮箱申请啦，zhuogu爷爷推荐您使用Gmail邮箱~

以下是退信说明：
Technical details of permanent failure:
Google tried to deliver your message, but it was rejected by the server for the recipient domain qq.com by mx3.qq.com. [119.147.192.199].

The error that the other server returned was:
550 Sender frequency limited. http://service.mail.qq.com/cgi-bin/help?subtype=1&&id=20022&&no=1000723

replies.author: 我被盗号了
replies.txt_content: 问一下，我用的也是Gmail,怎么还是提示SMTP。。。。

replies.author: 我爱我的世界
replies.txt_content: 为什么注册时“抱歉，服务器内部错误！请稍后重试。”

replies.author: 寂静战争
replies.txt_content: 好吧，怪不得今天申请总是失败。。。
